spec_data.Name: perl-Tk-EntryCheck
spec_data.Description:
This module acts as a little wrapper around Tk::Entry and adds an easy to
use interface to -validate and -validatecommand for controlling length and
content of an entry widget.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 05:39:53 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Interface to Tk::Entry for controlling its length and content
